title: FC Bayern Munich - Wikipedia
snippet: Not only that the 2023–24 Bundesliga was the first season in a decade that Bayern Munich did not win, losing it out to Bayer Leverkusen, but it was also the first time in twelve years that the club went trophyless in a season. title: Vincent Kompany - Wikipedia
snippet: On 29 May 2024, Kompany was appointed as the new head coach of Bundesliga club Bayern Munich, signing a three-year deal. Burnley received a reported £10.2 million in compensation for the remainder of his contract, which made Kompany one of the most expensive managers in history.

title: Vincent Kompany succeeds Thomas Tuchel as Bayern Munich head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Vincent Kompany is Bayern Munich's new head coach.

title: Bayern Munich - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt

title: Contract until 2027 | Vincent Kompany named new FC Bayern head coach
snippet: FC Bayern have confirmed Vincent Kompany as their new head coach. The 38-year-old has agreed a contract with the German record champions through to 30 June 2027.
